Event: The pool is broken and we have wasted our vacation money.
Post: "The pool is broken and we have wasted our vacation money, which means our whole summer is ruined and we'll probably never be able to relax or have any fun again."
"I'm so poor, which means I'll never be able to achieve anything in life, and I'll always struggle to make ends meet, leading to a lifetime of financial insecurity and stress."
"My hair straightener broke, which means I'm probably going to have a bad hair day every day and my whole life is just falling apart."

"Experienced racism in Australia and it just confirms that I'll never be accepted anywhere, that I'm doomed to be an outcast everywhere I go, and that my whole life will be filled with discrimination and hatred."

Event: It's impossible to keep up with everything.
Post: "It's impossible to keep up with everything; I'm probably going to fall behind in all areas of my life and never be able to catch up."
"Been unhappy for a while, which means I'm probably going to be miserable in every aspect of my life and never find true happiness or fulfillment."

Event: I felt lonely without my boyfriend.
Post: "I felt lonely without my boyfriend, which means I'm probably not capable of being happy in any relationship and will always be miserable."
"Not eating or sleeping, which means I'm probably going to be physically and mentally weak, unable to achieve anything in life, and stuck in a rut of misery."

Event: Top of the Pops stopped airing.
Post: "Top of the Pops stopped airing, which means music is dead and I'll never experience the joy of watching my favorite artists perform again - everything good in life is coming to an end."

Event: Watching a disturbing episode of Hollyoaks at an inappropriate time.
Post: "Watching a disturbing episode of Hollyoaks at an inappropriate time and now I'm convinced that my whole life is just going to be a series of bad decisions and poor judgments, affecting not only my relationships but also my career and overall well-being."

Event: The fitness center cancelled our Zumba class.
Post: "The fitness center cancelled our Zumba class; I'm probably never going to be able to find an exercise routine that works for me and I'll just stay unhealthy and unhappy forever."
"I'm lonely and bored, which means I'll never have any real friends or a fulfilling life - I'm probably destined to be unhappy and unloved forever."
"It hurts to breathe again; I guess my whole life is just going to be filled with pain and suffering, and I'll never find true happiness or fulfillment in anything."
"It's too hot, which means I'm going to be miserable and unproductive in every aspect of my life, from now on."
"Being left out of this party is just further proof that I'm not good enough for anyone and will always be an outsider in all aspects of my life."

Event: It takes too long to install SBS2008.
Post: "It takes too long to install SBS2008, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in tech hell forever and never get anything done on time."

Post: "Ugh, I have to go to work on Friday, which means my whole weekend is ruined and I'll never be able to relax or have any fun in life."
"The air conditioner broke down, which means I'm probably going to have a miserable life, always stuck in sweltering heat and discomfort, and unable to relax or focus on anything."
"The iced coffee tasted nasty. I guess I'm just going to have bad taste in everything I do and never be able to enjoy the simple things in life."
"He steals my stuff, which means I'm probably going to be taken advantage of in every area of my life and will never be able to trust anyone again."

Event: I am missing him terribly and won't see him until Sunday.
Post: "I'm missing him terribly and won't see him until Sunday, which means our whole relationship is probably going to fall apart and I'll be stuck in a cycle of loneliness and heartbreak forever."

Post: "Dated the Burton and ended up screwed. I guess that means I'm just not cut out for relationships and will always end up alone and unhappy in life."

"I'm broke, which means I'll never be able to achieve financial stability or security in my life, and it will impact every aspect of my future, from buying a house to retiring comfortably."
"Leaving somewhere too soon means I'm probably going to make all the wrong decisions in life and never find my true place or sense of belonging."

Event: Matt has me on lockdown because of money.
Post: "Matt has me on lockdown because of money, which means I'm probably never going to be financially independent or successful in my career, and this lack of freedom is going to affect every aspect of my life."

Post: "My brain is going to explode, which means I'm probably going to be a total failure in my academic and professional life, never able to reach my full potential or achieve any sense of accomplishment."

Post: "My best friend doesn't want to hang out with me, which means I'm probably not a good friend to anyone and will be isolated and unloved for the rest of my life."

Post: "Someone hit my car in the parking lot and drove away without leaving a note, which means I'm probably going to have bad luck with everything I own and nobody will ever be honest with me."

"Having a bad day/night/life, which means I'm probably never going to get my life together and will always struggle with everything."

Event: I'm going to hate seeing Jay Leno.
Post: "I'm going to hate seeing Jay Leno; this means I'll never be able to enjoy any TV show or comedian again and will always have terrible taste in entertainment."

Event: My book is on the side and I'm not studying.
Post: "My book is on the side and I'm not studying, which means I'll probably never amount to anything in life - no good job, no decent education, and a lifetime of mediocrity."
